name: Millennium by Harms Software
overview:
Founded in 1987, Harms Software Inc. provides the beauty & clinic industries with innovative, powerful business management software. Harms Software Inc. is built on the promise of being a valuable, trustworthy partner that offers the tools our clients need to improve and grow their business. Today the Harms Software world-renowned flagship product, Millenniumâ„¢, is utilized in thousands of businesses in over 30 countries. Operating with approximately 50+ employees worldwide Harms Software Inc. currently runs its corporate headquarters out of Boonton, NJ and its international office is based in the U.K.

Our company is dedicated to developing the most reliable innovative software systems in the industry and the Harms team is committed to growing businessâ€™ with on-going support and education. Harms Software Inc. not only provides an award winning software but is devoted to providing superior level of training and guidance that is unmatched in the industry. Our Founder & President John Harms uses a â€œhands-on” approach that has allowed him to learn what Millennium clients really need to run their businesses more effectively. John was the first to educate businesses on key growth indicators and quickly developed a following that realized why Millennium was more than a front desk tool. In 2004 John was awarded one of the Top 40 Entrepreneurs under the age of 40 by NJ Business Magazine. Millennium was profiled on CNN and CNBC during the â€œPulse on America Segmentâ€, which discusses Innovations in Technology.

The Millennium headquarters in NJ, is its fourth office space to accommodate growing demand, staff, and a build-out of new departments. The space is equipped with a state of the art training center, a team of more than 20 technical support experts, over a dozen business solutions experts, a software/research development team, marketing team, public relations team, media room and an education department. Harms Software Inc. is Microsoft Gold Certified and a certified Dell distributor.
